name: @realm/example-node-connection-and-error
description: An example app using Atlas Device Sync for showcasing how to detect various changes in connection state, user state, sync errors, and product inventory.

scripts.success: npm run build && node dist/app.js success
scripts.register-invalid: npm run build && node dist/app.js register-invalid
scripts.register-email-in-use: npm run build && node dist/app.js register-email-in-use
scripts.login-invalid: npm run build && node dist/app.js login-invalid
scripts.login-non-existent-email: npm run build && node dist/app.js login-non-existent-email
scripts.sync-error: npm run build && node dist/app.js sync-error
scripts.client-reset: npm run build && node dist/app.js client-reset
